entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
